entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
